meanings.definition: A type of Asian vegetable with dark green spoon-shaped leaves.
meanings.sent1: I planted some tatsoi in my garden to add variety to my meals.
meanings.sent2: The farmers market had fresh tatsoi for sale this morning.
meanings.sent3: The tatsoi in my salad started a conversation with the carrots.
meanings.sent4: The tatsoi leaves danced in the wind like graceful ballerinas.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green tatsoi stood out among the other vegetables.

meanings.definition: The edible leaves of the tatsoi plant.
meanings.sent1: I stir-fried the tatsoi leaves with garlic and soy sauce for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The chef used tatsoi to garnish the dish and add a pop of color.
meanings.sent3: The tatsoi leaves giggled as they were being washed in the sink.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like tatsoi leaves under the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the cooking tatsoi filled the kitchen with a delightful scent.
